statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating, comment FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating < 2;
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, created_at FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, comment FROM feedback_reviews WHERE feedback_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, rating, created_at FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating < 2 OR rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC, created_at ASC;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM feedback_reviews WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY customer_id HAVING feedback_count > 5 ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT review_text, review_date FROM ServiceReviews WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM ServiceReviews ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating < 3 AND feedback_text LIKE '%poor%' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT review_id, review_text, review_date FROM ServiceReviews WHERE service_id = 2001 ORDER BY review_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(review_id) AS num_reviews FROM ServiceReviews GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_reviews > 2 ORDER BY num_reviews DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT feedback_id, satisfaction_score FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 3
SELECT * FROM Review ORDER BY review_id DESC
SELECT suggestion_text, improvement_status FROM ServiceImprovement WHERE improvement_status = 'In Progress'
SELECT customer_id, review_text, rating FROM Review WHERE rating >= 4
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, satisfaction_score FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' OR feedback_text LIKE '%excellent%' ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM Review JOIN CustomerFeedback ON Review.customer_id = CustomerFeedback.customer_id WHERE Rating >= 4;
SELECT suggestion_text, improvement_status FROM ServiceImprovement WHERE improvement_status = 'Implemented' ORDER BY suggestion_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE satisfaction_score < 3 AND customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating < 4 ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_level FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_level BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY satisfaction_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT improvement_text, improvement_date FROM service_improvements ORDER BY improvement_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT service_name, category, price FROM services ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT review, timestamp FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT service_name, category, description FROM services WHERE category = 'Maintenance';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT service_name, category, price FROM services WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT R.rating, F.review, S.service_name FROM ratings R JOIN feedback F ON R.feedback_id = F.feedback_id JOIN services S ON R.service_id = S.service_id WHERE R.rating > 3 ORDER BY R.rating DESC;

SELECT R.rating, F.review, F.timestamp, S.service_name, S.price FROM feedback F JOIN ratings R ON F.feedback_id = R.feedback_id JOIN services S ON R.service_id = S.service_id WHERE F.timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY F.timestamp ASC;
